title: Genus Nehalennia
description: **_Nehalennia_** is a genus of very small damselflies in the family Coenagrionidae. Most of the species are commonly known as **Sprites**. One species, *N. speciosa* occurs in Eurasia; the rest in North and South America. The genus was named by [Edmond de SÃ©lys Longchamps](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edmond_de_S%C3%A9lys_Longchamps) in 1850, the name might be derived from the old godess named [*Nehalennia*](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nehalennia).
